milestones.title: Baseline contour and validation
milestones.goal: Lock and verify the already implemented baseline elements of Engine/Client separation.

features.title: Close remaining Engine/Client separation points and formally fix module boundaries.
Formalize the Client <-> Engine API contract in a separate specification and make it the source of truth.
Lock and document the baseline Client <-> Engine integration contract (validation, error handling, proxy behavior).

non_feature_items.title: The baseline contour is formally validated: dev/prod flows are reproducible and match the current architecture.
non_feature_items.reason: Validation criterion, not a standalone deliverable feature.

standalone_issues.title: Materialize DEV_MAP milestones and features to GitHub

tasks.title: Materialize roadmap milestones and features from DEV_MAP to GitHub
tasks.summary: Create/sync GitHub milestones using only DEV_MAP milestone/feature texts for descriptions, create high-level feature issues from DEV_MAP text without assigning GitHub milestones to issues, and persist resulting links back into DEV_MAP without task-level decomposition changes.

milestones.title: Video-ID indexing and UI rewrite foundations
milestones.goal: Isolate the indexing contour into a separate milestone and complete migration to a stable ID scheme.

features.title: Migrate to video-ID-based indexing (top priority).
Adapt the existing full index rebuild mechanism to video ID.
Implement/adapt incremental vector and index recomputation for the new scheme.
Ensure correct content deletion without full index rebuild.
Perform a major frontend refactor (replace static HTML/CSS).
Introduce a scalable frontend framework and component architecture.
Design and implement a unified design system.
Implement a responsive and mobile-friendly interface.
Implement the Home page (feed modes, video cards, dynamic loading).
Implement the video search page.
Implement the video page (player, comments, similar/up-next block).
Implement like/dislike functionality (add/remove).

non_feature_items.title: Migration to video ID does not break delivery or API contract; full/incremental/rebuild scenarios are aligned.
non_feature_items.reason: Validation criterion, not a standalone deliverable feature.

milestones.title: API v1 and discovery behavior
milestones.goal: Rewrite the current UI on the new architecture without losing existing capabilities.

features.title: Design and implement a public REST API.
Implement API versioning.
Implement feed modes: random, hot, popular, fresh, recommendations.
Implement endpoint similar(video_id).
Implement endpoint recommendations(list_of_video_ids).
Implement a separate search API.
Verify client read compatibility during indexing scheme changes.

non_feature_items.title: Home/Search/Video run on the new UI architecture with API v1 and feed modes.
non_feature_items.reason: Validation criterion, not a standalone deliverable feature.

milestones.title: Discovery and controlled content scope
milestones.goal: Improve source controllability and discovery behavior without mandatory deep personalization.

features.title: Implement content selection endpoint within a specified instance/source.
Add crawler mode with federated scope limitation (via a new flag).
Implement storage of local user actions (likes/comments) in a local data model.
Implement a feed parameter panel.

non_feature_items.title: Content sources and crawler scope are controlled explicitly and predictably.
non_feature_items.reason: Validation criterion, not a standalone deliverable feature.

milestones.title: Federation and social delivery
milestones.goal: Build a working federated contour and validate it in practical hosting modes.

features.title: Implement ActivityPub actor for Engine.
Implement follow logic and processing of incoming ActivityPub updates.
Implement deduplication of incoming ActivityPub activities.
Implement sending likes and comments via ActivityPub to the source instance.
Implement user profile (avatar, nickname, settings).
Implement user data export mechanism.
Add integration and contract tests for the federated flow.

non_feature_items.title: Fix the interaction architecture for the scenario where Engine and Client are hosted on one machine.
non_feature_items.reason: Too broad as a single feature; should be decomposed into explicit deliverables/issues.

non_feature_items.title: Social actions from Client and federated ingest in Engine pass end-to-end and are covered by tests.
non_feature_items.reason: Validation criterion, not a standalone deliverable feature.

milestones.title: Moderation and governance
milestones.goal: Ship a practical moderation MVP with transparent rules and entities.

features.title: Implement Engine moderation system (ban instances, channels).
Implement public Engine dashboard (key statistics).
Implement collection and publication of statistical data.
Implement display of blocked / active / new instances.
Implement moderation and data management UI for Engine.
Implement UI for Engine analytics.
Implement user reporting mechanism (report + reason).
Implement moderation dashboard.
Implement client-side moderation system (users/content/comments).

non_feature_items.title: Reports and moderation outcomes are consistent between Client UI and Engine moderation state.
non_feature_items.reason: Validation criterion, not a standalone deliverable feature.

milestones.title: Production operations and reliability
milestones.goal: Close production contour and security layer on top of a stable architecture.

features.title: Implement independent production deployment for Engine.
Simplify build and data build into a single command workflow (production-ready).
Implement database migration system.
Implement data backup mechanism (database and indexes).
Implement task queue system for heavy operations.
Enable third-party instances to use Engine via API (plugin-like scenario).
Implement API-level rate limiting (IP, instance, service keys).
Implement IP and instance-level blocking and restriction mechanisms.
Implement input size limits and request validation.
Implement service/API keys for internal and admin scenarios (not end-user auth).
Implement service key management (create, revoke, limits).
Implement baseline roles/permissions for admin operations.
Implement independent production deployment for Client.
Implement client-side security hardening (XSS, CSRF, session protection, secure headers).

non_feature_items.title: Production deployment and security perimeter operate together without degrading public client availability.
non_feature_items.reason: Validation criterion, not a standalone deliverable feature.

milestones.goal: Make the platform understandable and integrable for external users.

features.title: Create a separate project presentation website.
Describe architecture (Engine + Client + interaction model).
Describe platform capabilities and usage scenarios.
Add a section about the public API and integration possibilities.
Add links to live demo / UI.
Prepare full technical documentation (installation, startup, deployment, data build, API usage).
Provide clear documentation for third-party developers who want to use Engine.

non_feature_items.title: Documentation reflects real Engine+Client behavior and is understandable for external developers without implicit knowledge.
